```{r setup}
library(Rwaves)
```

# Read data in

In order to read the data in use the ANA format.

```{r read}
x <- readData("../inst/extdata", "ANA")
```

# Data analysis

In order to obtain results do:

```{r analysis}
y <- rwaves(x)
y
```
